sentence.Network_en: He suffered from curvature of the spine.
sentence.Network_cn: 脊柱弯曲使他痛苦不堪。

sentence.Network_en: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentence.Network_cn: 山顶上升气流强度随速矢端迹曲率加大而稍有加强.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... 不定积分 indefinite integral 曲率 curvature 偏微分 partial differential.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... signature 签名，署名 curvature 弯曲（部份） armature 盔甲.
新概念英语Ⅲ（11-20） ... Integrity n. 正直, 诚实 curvature n. 弯曲度 vehicle n. 交通工具, 车辆.
电梯英语 - 水宝贝的日志 - 网易博客 ... current regulator " 电流调节器,稳流器" curvature " 曲率,曲度" cushion " 垫,缓冲垫&quot.

list.abs: 两个主曲率的平均值称为平均曲率(Mean curvature),两个主曲率的乘积称为高斯曲率(Gaussian curvature)。平均曲率描述的是某一点的曲面“嵌入”周围环境的程度。.
scalar 纯量scalar curvature 纯量曲率scalar density 纯量密度
sectional area 截面积sectional curvature 截面曲率sector 扇形
1人体的解剖方位(上 - 豆丁网 ... 胃底- fundus of the stomach 胃小弯- lesser curvature 胃大弯- greater curvature.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin curvatura, from curvare (see curve)

entry.def: The curvature of something is its curved shape, especially when this shape is part of the circumference of a circle.

example.ex: He suffered from curvature of the spine.
example.tran: 脊柱弯曲使他痛苦不堪。

means.word_mean: 1. (medicine) a curving or bending; often abnormal;
2. the rate of change (at a point) of the angle between a curve and a tangent to the curve
3. the property possessed by the curving of a line or surface

auth_sentence.content: Curvature can be created in a quantum space only.
auth_sentence.res_content: Curvature can be created in a quantum space only.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Curvature can be created in a quantum space only.

auth_sentence.content: A tall man with an astonishing...curvature of the spine.
auth_sentence.res_content: A tall man with an astonishing...curvature of the spine.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A tall man with an astonishing...curvature of the spine.

auth_sentence.content: I said nothing about a "universal curvature".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I said nothing about a "universal curvature".

sentences.en: In my opinion, the curvature was determined experimentally.
sentences.cn: 依我看，这种曲度是根据实验确定的。
